info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 3 at 1:51PM CDT until June 3 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita KS
info.description:
FFWICT
The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Central Butler County in south central Kansas...
* Until 600 PM CDT.
* At 151 PM CDT, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 4 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1.5 to 2.5 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for areas in and around the city of El Dorado. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW!
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Law enforcement reported multiple submerged cars in El Dorado.
IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... El Dorado, El Dorado Airport, El Dorado State Park and El Dorado Lake.
info.instruction:
Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.
Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don't drown.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR AREAS IN AND AROUND THE CITY OF EL DORADO
NWS: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY this area til 6:00 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY is in effect for this area until 6:00 PM CDT. This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR AREAS IN AND AROUND THE CITY OF EL DORADO
SNM: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 6:00 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 6:00 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion extremadamente peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
